s: In brief: Being a car guy (with a background in furniture), I was really drawn to the design of Vertagear chairs and wanted to like it so bad but it just didn't work. I couldn't bring myself to buy any of the tacky racing chairs from competing brands but I regret that I had so much trouble ...

t: VERTAGEAR Racing Series Gaming Chair, Steel, Black, XL : Amazon.co.uk: Home & Kitchen
s: Over a month later, there has still been no resolution by Vertagear customer services, I've even offered to pay for a replacement seating mechanism out of warranty but still no response. The chair was rated to 200kg / 440lbs, even as a big guy I'm only 130kg / 285lbs. For the price (this is NOT a cheap chair) I expected better quality and service. I will be replacing this with a new chair from a different brand...
